titles.title: Observing the 100th birthday of the late Les Paul, the "Wizard of Waukesha", and honoring his contributions to the American music industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
6/4/2015--Introduced. Recognizes and celebrates the 100th birthday of the late Les Paul.
Commemorates his contributions to American society as a gifted musician, inventor, and musical pioneer.
